messages.title: Change Britain's Future
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats are the voice of opposition to a brutal hard Brexit. We will hold a referendum on the final terms of the Brexit deal. Vote Liberal Democrat for a country that is open, tolerant, united, and fully engaged with our neighbours.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Holding a referendum on the final terms of the Brexit deal to oppose a hard Brexit and maintain a tolerant, united country that is engaged with Europe.

issues.brexitEurope: Opposition to a brutal hard Brexit, promoting a referendum on the final terms of the Brexit deal.
issues.economy: Our country cannot thrive without a strong economy. Theresa May alone is responsible for pursuing a course of a strong economy and a hard Brexit.
issues.socialWelfare: Economic damage is already being felt by the people the Tories have always cared about least: the poor, the insecure and the vulnerable.

endorsements.endorsement: The economic damage is already being felt by the people the Tories have always cared about least: the poor, the insecure and the vulnerable.

quotes.text: The economic damage is already being felt by the people the Tories have always cared about least: the poor, the insecure and the vulnerable.
quotes.source: Nick Clegg, Liberal Democrat spokesperson on Europe

images.caption: Tim Farron and a young European at the March for Europe, spring 2017.
Mark Argent for Hertford and Stortford.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Printed by Solopress, 9 Stock Rd, Southend-on-Sea SS2 5QF. Promoted by Julia Davies on behalf of Mark Argent (Liberal Democrats), both at 53 Lawrence Ave, Stansted Abbotts, Herts. SG12 8TY
